channel.title: Which runescape buying items/cash sites are legit?
channel.description: Im wondering what sites are legit for buying items/cash for runescape why i ask is because i got lured for 50m yesterday and i want to know some legit sites i can use to buy it back.

item.title: Which runescape buying items/cash sites are legit?
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:10, topic:384547”][quote author=Scaar link=topic=480311.msg3518767#msg3518767 date=1299224156]
Just bought:
Iron arrows 50K
Water rune 50K
Maple logs 50K
Uncut sapphire 3K

for like $16 making 2m more than i would have if i bought money from USfine

And they seem to be professional and as fast as they can be, but they also seem to need to restock when you buy items so i would stick with cash
[/quote]
Where exactly was that from…[/quote]
My guess is USFINE.

Read full topic
item.source: Which runescape buying items/cash sites are legit?

item.title: Which runescape buying items/cash sites are legit?
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

USFINE is the most legit. Gold4RS is also good for GOLD.

Both of these sites are amazing for buying Gold usually, but can be a pain when buying items or skills.
I would suggest buying items/skills off http://Sythe.Org but using common sense…refer to a trader’s vouches, and use a MM.
